timeline.message: convert Message#cssClass to enum and check values
use distinct tags so that messages appear individually

basic work on getting CSS classes reflected in the UI (JSP only)

- move getHighestCssClassLevel to MessagesUtils
- introduce basic CSS styles

fixes #2974
add note style to autocomplete error

timeline.bodyText: I think I've never seen a java method starting with capital letter

timeline.bodyText: there is compareTo of a Comparable interface
timeline.author: ktulinger

replies.bodyText: This is needed for max() which requires Comparator rather than Comparable. However, the method needs to be static so it can be used via method reference hence the class cannot implement Comparator.
replies.author: vladak

replies.bodyText: perhaps using Comparator as a static member is the cleanest way.
replies.author: vladak

timeline.bodyText: sounds like a job for flatMap
timeline.author: ktulinger

replies.bodyText: okay, I converted the code for the sake of learning stream API :-)
